duration_in_months: This is does not make sense. It's a concatenated string of completely unrelated things
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title**
Heating Fuel for Delivery to ISC via Ontario Winter Road

**Solicitation Number**
WS4345163040

**Dated For Release**
December 8, 2023

**Closing Date and Time**
January 12, 2024, by 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

**Expected Contract Date**
January 26, 2024 to March 31, 2025

**Tender Notice Type**
 Request for Proposal (RFP)

This RFP is now closed for submission.

**Summary**
The Government of Canada is issuing a request for proposal for the supply and delivery of #2 Heating Fuel Oil and fuel oil to the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) based on the Ontario Winter Road (OWR) route.

**Trade Agreements**
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

• Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
• Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
• Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
• Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
• Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
• Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
• Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
• Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
• Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
• World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Location of Delivery**
Fuel deliveries will take place to ISC facilities in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Entity**
This procurement is managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Point of Contact**
For more information, please contact:
Lacelle, Ann (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: Not Available 
Email: [ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
[Visit the Ariba website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18231745?extsite=MTgyMzE3NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please visit the link for the full tender document and submission details. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price bid received. All bids must be received on or
